## Data Processing

R libraries _data.table_ and _dplyr_ are used for data manipulation, _lubridate_ for handling dates, and _ggplot2_ for plotting.

```{r }
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
```
